subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Clemson’s kicking game could not rescue a stagnant offense as the junior Mark Buchholz, a first-year starter who had earned three letters in soccer, missed four field-goal attempts.
snippet: Clemson’s kicking game could not rescue a stagnant offense as the junior Mark Buchholz, a first-year starter who had earned three letters in soccer, missed four field-goal attempts.
